p: In addition to the empirical contact networks, we also study scale-free networks of different sizes. See Fig 5. These networks behave slightly differently from the empirical networks with CI dominating the high- c vacc low- c info region, Acquaintance dominating the low- c vacc high- c info region, Random walk being the best for the region of intermediate c vacc and c info, and TSH being the best protocol for some low c info values and intermediate c vacc values.
